title: Banks create money by lending excess reserves

content.question: Commercial banks can create money by

choices.label: transferring depositors' accounts at the Federal Reserve for conversion to cash
buying Treasury bills from the Federal Reserve
sending vault cash to the Federal Reserve

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
